title: Ticket #385: "condor_off -peaceful <name>" can report query problems
description:
Running "condor_off -peaceful <name>" can report query problems, even if the schedd / startd aren running: 

nleroy@tonic% condor_off -peaceful tonic.cs.wisc.edu
Sent "Set-Peaceful-Shutdown" command to startd tonic.cs.wisc.edu
Can't find address for schedd tonic.cs.wisc.edu
Perhaps you need to query another pool.
Found no ClassAds when querying pool (local)
Can't find address for master tonic.cs.wisc.edu
Perhaps you need to query another pool.

nleroy@tonic% condor_status -any

MyType               TargetType           Name

Scheduler            None                 nleroy@tonic.cs.wisc.edu
DaemonMaster         None                 nleroy@tonic.cs.wisc.edu
Negotiator           None                 nleroy@tonic.cs.wisc.edu
Machine              Job                  slot1@tonic.cs.wisc.edu
Machine              Job                  slot2@tonic.cs.wisc.edu
remarks:
2009-Apr-16 08:06:21 by matt:
It looks like you're running the Schedd as non-root, seems like you should have to off nleroy@tonic.cs.wisc.edu. If the Startd's name wasn't "nleroy@tonic.cs.wisc.edu" that's kinda scary.
creator: nleroy
